ArticleTitle.sentence: EnvZ functions through OmpR to control porin gene expression in Escherichia coli K-12.

event.clue: EnvZ functions through OmpR to control porin gene expression in Escherichia coli K-12.
EnvZ functions through OmpR to control porin gene expression in Escherichia coli K-12.
EnvZ functions through OmpR to control porin gene expression in Escherichia coli K-12.

AbstractText.sentence: The regulatory proteins OmpR and EnvZ are both required to activate expression of the genes for the major outer membrane porin proteins, OmpF and OmpC, of Escherichia coli K-12.

event.clue: The regulatory proteins OmpR and EnvZ are both required to activate expression of the genes for the major outer membrane porin proteins, OmpF and OmpC, of Escherichia coli K-12.
The regulatory proteins OmpR and EnvZ are both required to activate expression of the genes for the major outer membrane porin proteins, OmpF and OmpC, of Escherichia coli K-12.
The regulatory proteins OmpR and EnvZ are both required to activate expression of the genes for the major outer membrane porin proteins, OmpF and OmpC, of Escherichia coli K-12.

AbstractText.sentence: Here we show that OmpR, under certain conditions, could activate porin expression in the complete absence of EnvZ.

event.clue: Here we show that OmpR, under certain conditions, could activate porin expression in the complete absence of EnvZ.
Here we show that OmpR, under certain conditions, could activate porin expression in the complete absence of EnvZ.

AbstractText.sentence: In addition, the pleiotropic phenotypes conferred by a particular envZ mutation (envZ473) required the presence of functional OmpR protein.

event.clue: In addition, the pleiotropic phenotypes conferred by a particular envZ mutation (envZ473) required the presence of functional OmpR protein.
In addition, the pleiotropic phenotypes conferred by a particular envZ mutation (envZ473) required the presence of functional OmpR protein.

AbstractText.sentence: These results lead us to conclude that EnvZ and OmpR act in sequential fashion to activate porin gene expression; i.e., EnvZ modifies or in some way directs OmpR, which in turn acts at the appropriate porin gene promoter.

event.clue: These results lead us to conclude that EnvZ and OmpR act in sequential fashion to activate porin gene expression; i.e., EnvZ modifies or in some way directs OmpR, which in turn acts at the appropriate porin gene promoter.
